description: This file provides API functions for managing user progress and enrollment in a learning management system, including enrolling users, starting courses, updating progress, fetching user progress, and fetching aggregate stats.

methods.name: enrollUser
methods.description: Enrolls a user in a learning path, upserting the enrollment record.

methods.name: startCourse
methods.description: Starts a course for a user, creating or updating the course progress record.

methods.name: updateProgress
methods.description: Updates the progress percentage for a course, setting completion timestamp if 100%.

methods.name: fetchUserProgress
methods.description: Fetches all progress records for a specific user.

methods.name: fetchAggregateStats
methods.description: Fetches aggregate statistics such as total users, total enrollments, and average completion percentage.
